code: import React,{useState}from'react';import BorrowsService from'./BorrowService';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function BorrowInitiator(){const[borrow,setBorrow]=useState({clientId:'',mediaId:'',borrowDate:'',returnDate:'',returned:false});const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setBorrow(prev=>({...prev,[name]:value}));};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();BorrowsService.create(borrow).then(()=>alert('Borrow initiated successfully')).catch(error=>console.error(error));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"clientId",placeholder:"Client ID",required:true,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"mediaId",placeholder:"Media ID",required:true,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"borrowDate",type:"date",placeholder:"Borrow Date",required:true,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"returnDate",type:"date",placeholder:"Return Date",required:true,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Returned:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"returned",type:"checkbox",onChange:()=>setBorrow(prev=>({...prev,returned:!prev.returned}))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Initiate Borrow"})]});}export default BorrowInitiator;
